column3: This might be another reason that users are seeing issues like #17112 . We might want to consider this for backport

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #17993 (gui: Avoid redundant cs_main locks in balance polling. by furszy)

If you consider this pull request important,

Good catch and thanks for the fix.
Agree with @MarcoFalke that this should be backported.

> `tryGetBalance` just avoids waiting for the lock, is doesn't save you the time spent in `CWallet::GetBalance`, so I don't see how this could make it better\n\n@promag The case where this could alleviate GUI hangs is the case where `tryGetBalance` *succeeds* in getting the locks and balance without blocking, but then before the one of the two `m_node.getNumBlocks()` something else acquires `cs_
@ryanofsky ah! thanks for explaining. Nice catch @jnewbery.
